= Agenda of Project =

This project have strict rules:
   * [NoDependencies No dependencies]
   * [NoStaticUtilities No static utility classes]
   * [NoWrappers No wrapper or delegator classes]
   * [NoAllInOneJar Do not pack all staff into one jar]
   * [NoCodeComments Do not comment code blocks]
   * [OneComponentOneModule One component â€” one IntelliJ IDEA module]
   * [TestsForComponent Components must have unit tests]
   * [OneBuildScript All components must builded by one build script]
